properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first U.S.-Soviet joint space mission on July 15, 1975, in Moscow, U.S.S.R., by Alexei Leonov, Valeriy Kubasov, Thomas Stafford, Vance Brand and Donald “Deke” Slayton with Soyuz XIX and Apollo spacecrafts; cancellation stamp dated July 15, 1984 in Moscow; includes information on reverse.
